page.title: 16Retirement
page.content: There are many retirement homes in Southport.There are also many nursing homes and the hospitals have a lot of geriatric wards. Old people come to live in Southport because of the fresh sea air and there are plenty of things for pensioners to do. This area has several beautiful parks, gardens and other amenities. As a result of such a high proportion of old people living in the area, a quarter of the population, many jobs have been created. The people working to look after the elderly range from doctors through to those who clean the buildings. The health authority is the largest single employer in Southport. This year work began on the new General Hospital for the area, this is because the old hospitals are out of date and needed replacing.
